text: dewanna ee-shri lanka wada piliwela yatathe amerikanu dolar miliyana 15ka tendarayak, sudusukam athi samagam paseka la, kisima sudusukamak nathi janadhipathi aaryawage dilshan wikramasinha nam wu banata ayath aluthma, ee sandahama pihituwa gath kompaniyakata bharadima ganaya.

samuchcheda prahana: wikkhambhana thaththwaya nawatha nawathath karaddi nuwana ha ekathu wela samuchcheda washayen keles ithuru nathuwama nathi karanawa.
oba kiyana kramaya karannanam rajya aayathana haraha pudgala nidahasa dadilesa mardhanaya kalayuthuyi.

emanisa, jesus wahanse wisin upama bhawitha kirima, unwahansege kalayehi pawathi sampradaya anuwa giya, swabhawika uganwum kramawedayak wiya.[6][7]kithudahamehi prarambhayehi sitama, jesus wahanse wisin wadala upama, gena hara dakwima, uganwima saha sakachchawanta bandun kirima sidu wi atha .
eya budunge ka්ramayayi.
mama me sawathehi ma pipi kumudu athi chathumasiniya hewath pashchimakarthika purnimawa dakwa balami’yi wadalaha.
lagnadhipathi sikuru lagnaye swakshethrawa malawi yogayen da siti.
ee wagema nirmana katayuthu hondin karagena jiwathwenna thamayi balaporoththuwa thiyenne.
islam kanthawanta wruththin, raukiyawanhi nirathawima thahanam kara natha.
ohu gana mahathse pahadunu sowiyat guruwaru dinak leninge pothwala siyalu athpitapath saha mul lekhana gana ohuta penwa eewaye mudritha pitapath kiyawimata ohu unandu kalaha.
bhauthika sapa sampath udesa aathma garuthwaya ugasata thiyana eka ada boho seyin ihala gosin..

krik saha ohuge golayan wisin praweni ketha kodona hewath ekinekata athipihitha nowana bhashma thrithwayakin sadi athi bawa soya ganna ladi.

ilektronika saukhya thorathuru paddhathiya da janadhipathithuma athin wiwrutha kerunu athara sanwardhanaya karana lada rohala sadaha athulath kerunu palamu rogiya liyapadinchi kirima da janadhipathithuma athin sidu wiya.
eya lassana saha dhanawath rataki.
me katha karanne ara rathnapura paththe chande illapu premalal jayasekara mahaththaya ehemath nathnam ee choka malli gana neweyi..
mahacharya wi.ke. samaranayaka sammanaya
ee kiyanne api dan iranaya anugamanaya karanawa kiyana ekada?
manuwayi mamayi wada karanne plan ekakata anuwa.
ada me widihen handa eliya balannatath noweyi.

mema thinduwata erehiwa withthikaru abhiyachana kala athara ehidi lingika sansargayata kamaththa nothibu bawa oppu kirimata paminili pakshayata nohaki wi atha yana karuna uda abhiyachanadhikaranaya wisin withthikaru nidos kota nidahas kale ya.
wena ekek nam mama kanapita gahanawa .
uyanawa kiyala kiwwata eyala wadipurama kale koppa hodapu eka..
landanaye wilasitha aabhashaya peratu karagath batist merata nawa parapure hisake aarakshana peraliya bawata pathwanu atha.

halal sahathiketath eeka adalayi.
ee paryeshakayan kiyanawa.
thama dakina deya wenuwen oonama awadanamak baraganimata tharam adhishtanayak owun thula weyi.
janadhipathi madhya adhyaksha chamuditha samarawikrama mahatha pawasuwe methek ewani thiranayak gena nomathi bawayi.
me lipiyata adalayi kiyala hithuna..

mema idam yali athpath kara ganimedi jathiwadi, aagamwadi gatalu kisiwak nomathi bawath kumana jathiyaka, aagamaka ho purawidya watinakama ho ithihasaya wala damimata ida nothabana bawath ithihasaya rakaganime rajaye wagakima itukirima pamanak sidukarana bawath ohu kiya.
math baluwe punchi sandiye...
mithurek lesa owun langin aashraya karami.
ese wuwada ema sihinayan siyallama wiwaranaya kirimata haki wuwath
ma ayath wuye ‘shri lanka’ patiyataya.
me rupa pela dakiddi mata mathak wune ee siduwim pela, ape thaththa saha mage lama kalaya.......
ithihasaye siduwu darunu manushya ghathana pilibandawa gambauru wiga්rahayakata yannata merata kalawa asamath wiya.
koyi welaweth bella kadagena eka diha balagena
ehe pirith geyak.
eeka thamunnanselage ‘gedarinma’ patanganna kiyala’’
prashnaya ehemama ya.
ekata mata mage hodama yaluwek wena dulanga , kasun...

ee anuwa katahanda thamayi lokaye thiyena wadath ma sanwedi thurya bhandaya.
miniha langin yanakotath kollo hangila gnyaw gawa..

ee wagemayi rajathumawa pawadun ayata shapayak wadunadayi kiyana prashnaya thiyenawa..

pasu kala ruso idiripath kala adahas nisa lamaya pilibanda wadi unanduwak hata gathi.

ehi kramika wikashanaya anuwa pasukalinawa shyamopali mahanikaye, asgiri parshawaye athipujya apawath wi wadala halyale shri sumanathissabhidhana nahimiyoge awamen asgiri piriwena narampanawe aananda himiyo wetha pawara aththaha.

mata ahawala wenna athnam kiyala.
saragi rangana shilpiniyan athara idiriyenma inna yureni noshika mewara ayage upandinaya samarathne starfrends ekka.

mangala chayarupa ganimata saha widiyo gatha kirima sandaha da udyanaye idapahasukam thibenawa.
eeth hilari nam samupakara chandeta idiripath weyi kiyala bukiye thibuna...
wadha dima ha mudal kada ganimata darana uthsahaya.
“naya aapasu gewima dan rate wadagathma waya shirshaya wana athara ee sandaha laba ganna naya walin salakiya kiya yuthu kotasak wen kirimata siduwa athayi.”

mathi amathiwaruna්gen samanwitha disthrik sanwardhana kamitu raswimwaladi yali dhawana pathaya idikirimata salasum kara thibena athara ehidi dhawana pathaya anshaka 10 k dakunata wannata sthapitha kara kilomitarayak pamana pasupasata ganimatath salasum kara thibu bawath eya thawamath kriyathmaka nowima kanagatudayaka bawath ohu penwa deyi.

aacharya lestar jems piris, dharmasena pathiraja, wasantha obesekara, thissa abesekara, sumithra piris aadinge chithrapata rasaka janapriya dharawe sukumara yauwana charitha wenuwata mahathun (ahas gawwa), grama sewaka (eya dan loku lamayek) babun (baddegama), wilison (karumakkarayo) wyaidya sarath pathirana (ganga addara) chandare (para dige), dhanarathna (kadapathaka chaya) wanno hamuwethi.
sinhala pujawaliyehi athpitapathak da jathika kauthukagara pusthakalaye atha.
apa huruwa sitina paribhogika sanskruthiye sita ayojana sanskruthiya dakwa withankarawima, rata sanwardhana mawatha wetha genayama sandaha awashya mulika karunawe.

abhiyachanadhikaranaye athuru thahanam niyogaya nisa agamathiwarayata saha kabinat mandalayata ema dhurawala katayuthu kala nohaki bawath, ema nisa
janathawatayi ratawalatayi ediriwadikam kirimen walakinna - indiya widesha amathi lankawe nayakayangen illayi.

ee athara mage sithuwili pudumawemin hithanawa, me wage parisarayaka aa randenne kohomada kiyala.eeth ehema randennatath aata mokak ho sadharana hethuwak athi.mokak ho galawennata nohaki asaranakamak..

api dennatama ooෙn une langama nayo tikata witharak kiyala api dennage athe thibba ganen wade lassanata podiyata karanna..
sandaminita wechcha deyath liya athi siyallath sathya nisa gal gasi bala innawa hara karanna deyak hitha ganna bari una.

ee nisama ee charithaya mage hithatath thadinma kawaduna.
ehema kiyala loku husmak aragaththa.mata ekenma theruna mage hithata loku gindarak laginma enawa kiyala,hithuwa wagema eeka mage papuwata eya dunna
ekala thibune hora aanduwak.
kabandayoksayid wayuwa ihala yamata nodi iwath kirimath sidu wiya yuthuya.ese nowunahoth
ee anuwa abhiyachanadhikaranaya wisin mita pera karana lada niyogayakata anuwa karunu salaka balu nithipathiwaraya gnyanasara himiyanta erehiwa chodana 4k yatathe mema pethsama gonu karanu labuwa.
eya islam wirodhin upayogi karaganna tharamata apa islamaya kiyanna upayogi kara nogaththa yanna mage wishwasayayi.
ee prashnawalata kawuda madihath wenne?
samahara athdakim ee kalaye hatiyata tharamaka ralu karkasha lesakin danunada ada athithaya smaranaya karamin sinasimata hethu sadhaka sapaya denne ema athdakimya.
eyata eka hethuwak me boho dena wyayama nokarana, alasa piris wima.
ee athara lanka pithakan kondaya, me wanaye di wadi washayen dakagannata puluwan.

podujana eksath peramunu layisthuwa yatathe tharanga kala jawipeta 2000 parlimenthu mathiwaranayedi owun tharanga kala boho disthrikka wala wadima manapa gananak ganimata haki wuyeth, pasugiya mathiwaranayedi pradhana paksha samanga sandhanagatha wu hela urumaya ha janipe wani sulu paksha wala janapriya apekshakayinta theri path wimata haki weddi ese nokala sarath fonsekata jayagatha nohaki wuyeth, chandadayakayin wisin thoranne apekshakayin thidenekuge 'pakejayak' bawini.

lanka si niwus pas kapimak sambandhayen srujuwa chodana ella kala nohakiwa thibiyadith diwulapitiya pa්radeshiya lekamwariyage momba thala bawa kiya hena illu niyojya amathi ranjan ramanayaka maha bankuwe badumkara magadiya sambandhayen sakshi sahithawa kop warthawen srujuwama chodana ella wi athi hitapu maha banku adhipathita amathanne ‘ane sar mata me pongdak eksplen karaganna oona…’

namuth, apata thora ganimak thibenawa pamanak nowe; api danatamath thora ganim sidu karamin sitinnemu pawathna arbudaya wanahi rajya balaya thama karya bharaya itu kala yuthu wuth apa nuduru anagathayedi kisiyam aakaraye samanya thaththwayak prathisthapanaya weya yana apekshawen yuthuwa rajyaye upades pilipadimin sitiya yuthu wuth adeshapalanika mohothak lesa dakinnange sthawaraya barapathala ath waraddak wanne menisaya.
duwili alla balanna gihin kawuru hari moda kamata kiyapu nisa podi lamayinuth aragena maha kale madden eddi ra wela.

“prajathanthrawadaya sandaha awakashaya” wisin sanwidhanaya karana lada wirodhathawayata ekwemin wikalpa web adawiye sanskaraka sampath samarakon kiya sitiye marga nithi nisiyakara kriyathmaka karana lesa illa shishyayan diyath kala udghoshanayakata amanushika lesa pahara dima ta erehiwa adahas pala kirima jagath kirthidhara madhyawediya hiragatha kirima sandaha hethuwa karagena athi bawayi.
me athara hambanthotadi pasugiyada pawathi wirodhathawyaparayedi tharunayakuta paharadime chodanawata lakwa sitina sahakara polis adhikari ti.
uba oya kiyana widiye nagara thiyenne yurope samahara ratawal wala.
